Weather: Auckland has coldest morning of 2024 so far, cool temperatures to remain into next week https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/weather-auckland-has-coldest-morning-of-2024-so-far-cool-temporals-to-remain-into-next-week/MKQEYEF7Y5E4PLIX6JN7OCQOUA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/weather-auckland-has-coldest-morning-of-2024-so-far-cool-temporals-to-remain-into-next-week/MKQEYEF7Y5E4PLIX6JN7OCQOUA/ Raphael FranksMetService said Akl's Saturday temp coolest the city had been since October last year. Sat, 04 May 2024 08:32:25 +0000 MetService said Saturday morning’s temperatures were as low as 4.9C in Whenuapai, 5.6C at Ardmore, 8.1C at Auckland Airport, 9.8C at Māngere, and 11.6C at Whangaparāoa. Photo / Sylvie Whinray
